message:
Out copy_while(In first, In last, Out res, Pred cond)
and
Out copy_until(In first, In last, Out res, Pred cond)
What's the most useful STL extension you ever wrote? Or, lacking that, an extension you came across?
Anything at all that tastes like STL. A container, an algorithm, an iterator, a stream, a trait, ...
One algorithm I use a lot, to kick off:
it's not exactly STL-style, but I have a function that applies sprintf to std::strings
